mapper.sql: id, project_id, host, domain_name, parent_id, create_time, update_time, del_flg, create_id, update_id
mapper.select:
SELECT count(DISTINCT t1.company) FROM scan_host t1 LEFT JOIN scan_project_host t2 ON t2.`host` = t1.domain AND t2.del_flg = 0 LEFT JOIN scan_project t3 ON t3.id = t2.project_id AND t3.del_flg = 0 WHERE t1.del_flg = 0
and t3.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT count(distinct domain) FROM scan_host t1 LEFT JOIN scan_project_host t2 ON t2.`host` = t1.domain AND t2.del_flg = 0 LEFT JOIN scan_project t3 ON t3.id = t2.project_id AND t3.del_flg = 0 WHERE t1.del_flg = 0 and t1.is_major = 1
and t3.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT count(distinct domain) FROM scan_host t1 LEFT JOIN scan_project_host t2 ON t2.`host` = t1.domain AND t2.del_flg = 0 LEFT JOIN scan_project t3 ON t3.id = t2.project_id AND t3.del_flg = 0 WHERE t1.del_flg = 0 and t1.is_domain = 1 and t1.is_major = 0
and t3.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT t1.company as type,
COUNT(DISTINCT t1.parent_domain)
COUNT(DISTINCT t1.domain)
COUNT(DISTINCT t1.ip_long)
COUNT( DISTINCT t4.ip_long, t4.port )
COUNT( DISTINCT t4.server_name )
COUNT( DISTINCT t5.cms )
as value FROM scan_host t1 join scan_project_host t2 on t2.host = t1.domain and t2.del_flg = 0 join scan_project t3 on t3.id = t2.project_id and t3.del_flg = 0
join scan_port t4 on t4.ip_long = t1.ip_long and t4.del_flg = 0
JOIN scan_host_port t5 ON t5.domain = t1.domain AND t5.del_flg = 0
WHERE t1.del_flg = 0 and t1.company is not null and t1.company != '-'
and t4.server_name != '-'
and t5.cms != '-'
and t3.user_id = #{userId}
GROUP BY t1.company ORDER BY value desc limit #{limit}
